name: Forge
description: Forge is an oscilloscope themed robot belonging to the WebtrES club. Its box is painted in a vibrant orange color, giving it a distinct appearance. It has sturdy soldier buttons that allow it to perform various functions with precision. The arms and legs of Forge are made from durable materials sourced from a foundry, ensuring its strength and durability. Its screen displays a mesmerizing pattern resembling a winding snake, providing a visually appealing interface for data analysis and monitoring.
